panels.description: Indicates whether API Server, Scheduler or Controller manager is down.
panels.title: Control Plane Status

panels.description: This is true if there is insufficient memory on the node, which could cause the node to swap frequently.
panels.title: Memory Pressure

panels.description: This condition is true if there is insufficient disk space on the node.
panels.title: Disk Pressure

panels.description: True when there are too many processes running on the node, indicating a potential exhaustion of process identifiers (PIDs).
panels.title: PID Pressure

panels.description: Indicates that the network to the node is not correctly configured or not available.
panels.title: Network Unavailable

panels.description: Indicates that there are pods in failed phase
panels.title: Failed Pods

panels.description: Indicates that there are pods in unknown phase
panels.title: Unknown Pods

panels.description: Indicates that there are pods that cannot be scheduled.
panels.title: Unscheduled Pods
PVCs Full in 2 days - Based on Daily Usage
PVCs Full in 5 days - Based on Daily Usage
PVCs Full in 1 Week - Based on Daily Usage

targets.expr: count (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes{} ) and (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes{} )) / (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{} )) >= (80 / 100)) or vector (0)

panels.description: This table shows health status of nodes.
panels.title: Health Status by Node

panels.description: This table shows the resources usage of all nodes

targets.expr: (sum(node_memory_Buffers_bytes{job="node-exporter"}) by (instance) +  sum(node_memory_Cached_bytes{job="node-exporter"}) by (instance)) / sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{job="node-exporter"}) by (instance) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Resource Usage by Instance

panels.description: This table shows the resource requests and limits by pods deployed on specific node and their commitment level to node's resources.
panels.title: Resource Commitment by Node

panels.description: The table shows available disk size by mount points. Only mount point that used over 50% are displayed.

targets.expr: max by (instance, fstype, mountpoint) (node_filesystem_size_bytes{job="node-exporter", fstype!="", mountpoint!=""})

panels.title: Disk (Free)

panels.description: This table shows the CPU quota of pods in a namespace, shows only those that there CPU Requests (%) is greater then 80% and CPU Limits (%) is greater then 60%
panels.title: CPU Quota

panels.description: This table shows the Memory quota of pods in a namespace, shows only those that there Memory Requests (%) is greater then 80% and Memory Limits (%) is greater then 60%

targets.expr: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", image!=""}) by (namespace, pod) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_memory:active:kube_pod_container_resource_requests{}) by (namespace,pod)

panels.title: Panel Title

targets.expr:
sum by(verb) (rate(apiserver_request_total{code=~"5..",job="apiserver"}[5m]))
 / sum by(verb) (rate(apiserver_request_total{job="apiserver"}[5m])) OR on() vector(0)
